scripts.compile: mkdir -p /app/output/openapi/example-api && tsp compile example-api.tsp --output-dir /app/output/openapi/example-api && mv /app/output/openapi/example-api/@typespec/openapi3/openapi.yaml /app/output/openapi/example-api.yaml && rm -rf /app/output/openapi/example-api 2>/dev/null || true
